website_summaries.verdict: We tested both the standalone and Z-Wave versions, and were impressed by the quality, responsiveness and overall styling of this lock.
pros: The Kwikset Obsidian is small and sleek, with a simple touchscreen keypad and Z-Wave compatibility
cons: If you'd like to have Bluetooth capability or a spot for a physical key, the Obsidian will disappoint

customer_reviews.title: Definitely wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit and installed without difficulty. Within a few weeks, was getting a red error light flash. Reset according to manufacturers instructions, and it worked for a few days. Swapped out batteries, worked again for a few days. Unfortunately, return window had passed, so contacted manufacturer for warranty replacement. Kwikset assured me they were sending a replacement. First order was lost, with no communication from them. Second order has been placed. Still not received. Been waiting 3 months since initial contact, and have no reliable way to lock my house. Definitely wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented as a z-wave and they will take your money for their fault
customer_reviews.text: This deadbolt is not a z-wave as it is listed. When I returned the lock I was charged a restock fee of 20% even know they misrepresented the product. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and after a week no lock/unlock failure. The screen is bright but if you get morning/afternoon sun on it then the screen can be hard to see. If you have a glass window in your door you are going to have a bit of a hard time getting some of the screws in on that side. Its not impossible but difficult. Programming is easy and looks good on the door especially compared to the standard keypad.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design which is why it gets 1 Star. Otherwise I’d give it zero stars. For the price this lock should work flawlessly with better features. When the lock gets hit it doesn’t work. It will also randomly self enter numbers and then lock itself out after several wrong self entries. Worst battery operated lock I’ve ever installed/used.
customer_reviews.author: VN

customer_reviews.title: Modern sleek works great
customer_reviews.text: This lock is really nice and sleek. I used it for the garage door to make sure my young kids don’t go in and can’t get out when inside of the home. I followed the instructions step by step measured as instructed and no issues whatsoever. Took me about 30-45min not sure as I was tending to my kids at the same time. Be advised you will likely have to chip and make the bore hole bigger on the door frame because the latch is bigger than the standard ones. Programming was easy again it’s all in the step by step instructions. Great brand should last long
customer_reviews.author: MiA DA Don

customer_reviews.title: Great lock but having to replace batteries...alot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lock because I liked the Keypad look. Everything worked great until, after it locked one night, it started a long beep. I saw that it was a low battery so I changed it out. A few months later, I had to replace the battery again. My last battery operated lock lasted forever before I had to change out the battery. This ones seems to keep having battery problems at the worst time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Henry

customer_reviews.title: Not Wireless! Manufacture Defect!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am very upset with this product. First of all the description is very misleading as it seems that this lock can be controlled wirelessly. Unfortunately you have to choose the option below in the description to get the wireless lock. The second issue was that the lock was manufactured incorrectly as the insert for the lock shaft was installed upside down. I had to completely take the lock apart, removing the chip board and motor to adjust the female end of the shaft to line up with the lock shaft. It’s a nice looking lock but I am very dissatisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy, inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for just under a year and it stopped working. We barely use this door and it’s disappointing because it can’t be returned. It was glitchy from the start and I had a few calls in to tech support. It would be a decent unit if it worked. Unfortunately I can’t recommend it based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: ihsan

customer_reviews.title: Could be more user friendly
customer_reviews.text: 1. Noisy, un/lock actions are very noisy, never heard such a thing with any similar product. 2. Batteries don't last long, about 4 weeks. (Deadbolt is assembled properly and moves manually very smoothly, this is not the reason.) 3. To replace batteries, I have to remove the whole inside cover, involving 3 small screws; the bottom one is in line with the handle below and very tricky to screw back. There is a plastic, non-screws cover, but it is only for some buttons that are used only in installation, it is not big enough to replace the battery. Very inconsiderate design. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Great install
customer_reviews.text: I installed it today replacing an existing deadbolt. The process took about 20 minutes. The enclosed install instructions were the best I have even seen anywhere. They were very detailed and clearly understood. An outline video is also available. So far (just one day) it is operating perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, annoying to use compared to those with buttons.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our button version with this one and don’t like it. The touchscreen keypad doesn’t recognize when you press it and takes extra time. It takes longer to turn on and enter digits. The unlocking is also long and laborious, even with fresh batteries. I would not purchase this again. It looks nice, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the button ones, not touch
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with this lock. It is beautiful and modern and goes well with our kwikset door handles. HOWEVER: the touch pad may or may not respond when trying to unlock your home when it is hot outside. Sometimes I will spend over a minute caressing the thing so it responds to the touch if it’s midday and sunny. Also locks really loud when inside with a long beep (may be able to adjust this, haven’t looked). It does the job, but I do miss my old simple button one versus the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this lock again
customer_reviews.text: I initially wrote a bad review for this lock due to battery issues. I talked to Kwikset support and figured out it was because my door wasn’t lining up correctly. The battery was dying due to the lock trying harder than normal to lock. It was my fault, not the locks. I love the way the lock looks and functions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of kwikset z-wave locks. This was the first keyless one I tried. It worked okay for a month & then the batteries died. Replaced batteries and 2-3 weeks later those batteries were dead and leaking acid. Even new batteries don’t work now. Luckily i noticed this or we might have got locked out of the house. Totally worthless. Do yourself a favor & don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Henry M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad set up instructions; actual great product.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this lock is that the installation instructions were confusing (and, yes, I went online as well). It was really murky how to set it up to require a "pin code" before someone could add or modify entry codes. Turns out, you can't do it unless you set up the pin code first, so I had to do a factory reset. It's beautiful, however, simple-to-use, and it is weird to leave the house to walk around the neighborhood and not need to carry keys!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: So nice not to have to bring keys when going for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple set up, takes about 10 minutes from start to finish. So nice not to have to bring keys when going for a bike ride or a walk. It's also very clean looking and sleak, A+ for kwikset on this one.
customer_reviews.author: e.cepion

customer_reviews.title: Bought new and got a used pile of parts.
customer_reviews.text: So this is the worst thing I have ever bought off Amazon. I didn’t open the box for a couple months after I received it(that will never happen again) and the lockset I got is just a used pile of parts. The whole mess was just dropped in the box and all the screws and brackets pretty much beat the crap out of everything. I am not the most mechanical person and now I am afraid to even try and install it and get half way thru and be missing some small parts. Probably just going to toss the whole mess and start over. This is on the seller 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Had product for one year so far. Easy to use, looks great. Touch screen sometimes does not activiate at first touch, due to dust or accumlation on screen but does not affect performance. Draw back is changing batteries takes time because you have to remove several screws to access the back panel, which compared to other similar type locks, batteries are faster/easier to get to.
customer_reviews.author: Andres L.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with screws that did not fit the product or my door. The seller had me pay to return it. So at the end of the day I paid $20 and wasted two hours of my day on something that did not have the parts needed to install.
customer_reviews.author: Winston

customer_reviews.title: Locks look good and were very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Locks look good and were very easy to install. Liked these so much I installed them on every entry door. One critical feature that is missing is an app to manage user codes. These have to be programmed and managed individually. Removing and adding user codes is not difficult but not very convenient; impossible to do so remotely. I wanted locks that looked good and were not very "connected". These locks fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest touch screen.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. But I do have a hard time getting it to pick up my first touch. The screen doesn’t illuminate to enter the code until it first senses your touch. I have several others that are push button codes. They are much quicker and more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: solid performance for almost 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The deadbolt has worked for almost two years as the way to get in an airbnb. Installation was straight forward, if you read the instructions. Since the deadbolt works using 4 AA batteries, make sure it doesn't have to work harder than it should: adjust the strike plate and hole in the door jamb so that the dead bolt slides in with no pinching when you turn it by hand from the inside. We have found the batteries last 5 or 6 months, and with the exception of one or two guests, the lock is easy for people to figure out. I also like that it's 'not connected.'
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Allen

customer_reviews.title: Modern and useable
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek. Only slightly more trouble to unlock than physical keys. Super secure - no key way to pick. Using the new lithium ion rechargeable and getting Good results with the bolt. Had to trim one bolt hole deeper to meet the 1” depth of throw.
customer_reviews.author: Grinchy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a lock and you don’t need a key.
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it is supposed to do. I really dislike being asked to rate minutiae everyday products and then being forced to write words about it instead of just giving it an appropriate stars rating.
customer_reviews.author: youandty

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected product
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT!...Compact, stylish and simple display screen. It’s recommended to invest a door lock installation kit (ex. RYOBI Wood Door Lock Installation Kit,$22) to complete hole drilling on your front entry door. Rest of installation and setup is really easy once all holes drilled. I bought this product as add-on to my existing door lock and the non-wifi version works for me when I just need the auto-lock function.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Ng

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 weeks, locked us out of house
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our new home and had the finish carpenter install it. It stopped working after two weeks by locking us out of our house. We called Kwikset and they were not able to troubleshoot the deadbolt. They agreed to send us a new unit. We installed the new unit and after about a month, it also does not work. It locked us out of our house and we had to climb onto our second floor deck again to regain access to our house. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: rt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lock
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great for our patio door. The touch screen is a little quirky....you must touch a few times before the numbers show up, but might be due to the sun that is always blazing on the keypad. Very modern looking and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan N

customer_reviews.title: Latch is not aligned
customer_reviews.text: As the pictures shown, the arc is on the top when door latch is full extended. One the other hand, the latch holder, from the other part , has the arc 45 degree toward lower right side at locking position. How can one install these then?! Found out this when I almost finishing installation (step 4B). Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Liu

customer_reviews.title: Run!!
customer_reviews.text: This lock is just plain awful! There is a lack of instructions for install! God forbid if you have a left hand door swing! After you get it installed, lock screen only powers up a 1/4 of the time when you try to activate it. When it does power up and if its on the sunny side of the building, good luck seeing the numbers to be able to punch in codes. I will definitely be going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not functional after a year
customer_reviews.text: After being in use for a year, the lock stopped working. There is a glitch in the hardware that won't allow it to lock. It catches on the interior locking mechanism, and won't allow the lock to fully close.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the damn thing to work We have had 4 separate people look at it and read all directions and it still doesn't work. Should have stuck with my schlage keypads. Very disappointed because it looks so sharp and I wanted an upgrade from what I had on all my doors. I'm glad I only tried one instead of buying all that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Morin

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a keyed dead lock
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to a keyed dead lock. Works as advertised and allows multiple codes for different users to access. Can't be bumped as a conventional dead lock can be.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product but Amazon’s service is slipping.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been pretty happy with my existing obsidian lock and was looking to upgrade it to this model with the internet connectivity. Package arrived promptly but it was a previously returned item being sold as new. Amazon was willing to replace the item but Will take several days, opting to return instead for refund. I give the item itself 5 stars, but taking off points for the extra hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Todd James

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, secure, incredible value.
customer_reviews.text: This feels much more expensive than it is. Extremely adjustable for easy install. Works very well with my Insteon/ZW large smarthome/IoT install. Very secure non-hackable unlock via internet
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: i was disappointed that the screws that hold the cover on the ...
customer_reviews.text: this lock has a very modern look and compliments my door. i was disappointed that the screws that hold the cover on the piece that is on inside of door are too small. i will have to go to home depot and find some thicker screws to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works good most of the time
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, east to install and works fine. The only complain I would have is that it gets stuck sometimes and I need to press few buttons to work
customer_reviews.author: Edyta

customer_reviews.title: Overall i like this keyless deadbolt
customer_reviews.text: Overall i like this keyless deadbolt. Looks very modern and functions well. They touchscreen is fairly responsive, it's not as sensitive so you do have to press firmly. I deducted a star because the mechanism is kinda loud, wish it was a bit quiter.
customer_reviews.author: Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Took about 45 minutes with programming. I opted to turn dial switch 4 down to avoid seeing mixed numbers. Works perfectly! Looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Worked only 3 weeks without any issue
customer_reviews.text: After few weeks its auto lock function after 30 seconds not locking and making beep noise only. Otherwise looks clean and sturdy for sure more secure as other futures built in.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS

customer_reviews.title: Screen sensitivity could be better.
customer_reviews.text: the touch screen is a bit finicky. It takes a few presses to get the screen to respond. the Salt code is useful to make sure fingerprints and wear don't just go on the actual code digits.
customer_reviews.author: Nickel Idealtek inc on site tech support

customer_reviews.title: Package had already been opened & used!!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent over $200 on this deadbolt & it arrived in a package that looked beat up & worn. As I opened the box, it had loose parts out of the bags & has clearly been used. I bought it in advance for a project, but dont want to deal with installing it next month & finding out that it has missing parts or a password from the previous owner. Its probably a decent product, but Kwikset has been around a long time & should really check the return packages before sending them out again
customer_reviews.author: Boe Bigelow

customer_reviews.title: This is James Bond Level
customer_reviews.text: Supermodel of locks. This thing is absolutely beautiful. I’m using this on a inside secured room, it works perfectly. Looks so good, very clean install. Super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Ours broke very quickly after purchasing. Out locked out of our house because ur wouldn’t open even after changing the batteries. Terrible product. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Higgins

customer_reviews.title: the batteries last only a few months,
customer_reviews.text: the batteries last only a few months, the bolt takes way too long to fully engage and frequently doesn't lock due to misalignment
customer_reviews.author: AMT

customer_reviews.title: No customer support and batteries only last a month
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The batteries run out once a month and I have realigned and done everything they say in the instructions to remedy. Of course I only have the instructions to refer to because it’s impossible to reach support by phone and there’s no real trouble shooting online.
customer_reviews.author: TazmanianMan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t understand the bad reviews. This took minutes to install and set up, it looks beautiful and works perfectly. I’ve had a kwikset keyless entry That I’ve been using for 20 years and just replaced it with this I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Canice Canales

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought a different brand waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have the same problem, you touch the key pad it lights up then keep on pressing the Radom numbers nothing happens, you have to play with it in order to accept the code, I should have bought a different brand waste of money. I am past the return date but I just got the chance to install it this week, 7-21-2018.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Lock failed and i was locked out of my home.
customer_reviews.text: within3 hours of installing, the locked failed and i was locked out of my home. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: As long as you install it properly and don’t let it bind, it will run forever on batteries. The auto lock keeps our cat from escaping the house! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Touchy Keypad Finger Location
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, instructions should address the proper location of the connector wire, inside unit should provide a sturdier position holder to stop rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this lock!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to install... works really well. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gaglione

customer_reviews.title: and it is working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Update. The batteries actually only last for a month. I bought and installed this on 5/10. And I had to change batteries today 6/10. It was very easy to install, and it is working great so far. I like this product and glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Parents

customer_reviews.title: Looks AMAZING and goes really well with the other Kwikset products
customer_reviews.text: Looks AMAZING and goes really well with the other Kwikset products , however the touchpad can be unresponsive at times and can take 5 or more presses to have it respond.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install. Touch response is slow sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I really like design. But touch response is not so greate compare to schedule lock. I have to touch couple time to initiate or wait and touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Yim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and a great look on your door
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Just wish I had gotten the one with the Z-Wave chip inside. Difficult finding the chip.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted 3 months before the motor died, complete waste of money. Thankfully it happened on the unlock instead of the lock or we would have been locked out without a key option.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Poteet

customer_reviews.title: The lock itself is amazing, I wish it came with a feature to ...
customer_reviews.text: The lock itself is amazing, I wish it came with a feature to track when each code was being used so I knew how long people were in the house for but no issue due to having a Ring door bell which tracks people coming and going. Reliable and looks very high tech on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool lock... very slick
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a fair price. Shipping was super fast as described :) recommended
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyless Deadbolt!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to program. No keys. Can't pick the lock! :) Allows use of a Master Code so someone can't easily enter an access code you don't know about. Keep a log of the codes you create and who they are for so you can easily delete or edit them as needed. Once Kwikset makes Home Connect available for this lock it will be a 5 Star review! No release date available as of 31 Jan '18
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bostek

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Super fast 1 day shipping , nice product so far , great instructions. Pleased so far
customer_reviews.author: Glenn K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! Had it put in and it is miserable to use, it is so slow when you put in the code
customer_reviews.author: Louann Seborowski

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but.....IT DOESN'T WORK!!!! Lock set is supposed to automatically determine the locked / unlocked position......never would ...professionally installed, batteries heated up..bad circuit board Returned!!
customer_reviews.author: gaylord landahl

customer_reviews.title: No need for keys!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to install, but the product is awesome! No need for keys!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Like external battery option for dead battery start up.
customer_reviews.author: charles j barone

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: It jams all the time but you just have to go through the cycle of locking it and unlocking it again.
customer_reviews.author: Thefather1

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well I received the first one defective then received the replacement and was missing all screws had to rush to Home Depot and buy screws so can’t really say it has been a good experience
customer_reviews.author: Viviana T.

customer_reviews.title: Smart deadbolt with style
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my main entrance door to replace an older deadbolt. Managed to connect with my Ring Alarm which makes it well integrated and easy to use for all house members.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Jauroyou

customer_reviews.title: Sleak look, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I love how nice it looks, it's way quieter than the competetidors. We tried different ones but this one was the less noisy one.
customer_reviews.author: RJZ

customer_reviews.title: Sent a used product! Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Horrible came used! We decided to go with the Nest x Yale door lock.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I need the tutorial
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to configure, the passwords are not register. I do not think tutorial on internet. I followed all the instructions in the manual, but it still does not configure! Disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, simple no keyhole to pick or bump or drill.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Giles

customer_reviews.title: Very modern
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it. It can be a little loud
customer_reviews.author: Tania Deidan

customer_reviews.title: There is a 2-3 sec delay between waking up the touch screen and entering a user code.
customer_reviews.text: You have to stand there for 2-3 sec after waking up the touch screen before it accepts push entries. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Jules P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, I wouldn’t use it on an essential entry point
customer_reviews.text: The product functionality is hit or miss, not what I was expecting in terms of consistent performance.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Bought 2 and we are loving them.
customer_reviews.author: law

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, easy to install and works reliably.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and it was easy install. Its been working flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tillotson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and even easier to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and even easier to use. Looks awesome as well. Love not having to take my keys with me when I leave my place.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Simple Convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Design: Sleek, simple and doesn't take up too much real estate on the door. When compared to other touchpad designs, it's probably one of the smallest out there. Installation: Neither one of us is handy so we had someone come out and do it, but it was done super quickly. We've had this for a few months now and can safely say it's made things much more convenient (no more locking ourselves out!) - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Several times this lock had malfunctioned and we were unable to lock the door from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Schnoes

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option for a main door that gets used daily
customer_reviews.text: Spent 6 hours trying to install this product. I’m at a complete loss. I work in construction so installing doors and locks isn’t something new to me but now my back hurts, I’m frustrated. I’m pissed off. I’ve also modified my clear fir door so thi product would fit and now my old deadbolt isn’t an option. Even if this product did work it would still be way faster to dig through your pockets, fumble with your keys, and unlock it the old fashioned way. The keypad is slow to activate and the locking mechanism is slow to engage. One star is far too generous.
customer_reviews.author: chris coker

customer_reviews.title: Needs a couple of touches
customer_reviews.text: So far this is working pretty well and is really convenient. The only problem is that it takes several touches for the keys to light up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gay

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The numbers don’t always light up so you can’t even get into your house (because there’s no key option and you rely on the numbers lighting up). Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Aldous

customer_reviews.title: This lock is the worse you can ever spend your money on
customer_reviews.text: This lock is the worse you can ever spend your money on! After installation and working it for two days the lock started to not open or close the digital panel started freezing and the lock would lock until you hard reset it. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELER! I took the lock apart and put everything in zip lock bags. The seler then commatecd me saying that I have a problem
customer_reviews.author: yevgine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought two and One is mulfunction need to contact supplier .
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lock
customer_reviews.text: The lock is attractive (which is why I purchased it) but make sure you use AAs (not AAAs) in the battery pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean Looking and Conveinant Back Up Key
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Note if the bolt drags in the door slot. If too much resistance is met it may eat batteries faster. With lots of use (smoker going outside) they last about 1.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nonya

product_meta.title: Kwikset 99530-002 Obsidian Slim Modern Electronic Touchscreen Keyless Deadbolt, Venetian Bronze
product_meta.description: Style:Non-Connected| Color Name:Venetian BronzeThe Obsidian touchscreen electronic deadbolt is a keywayless, low-profile, one-touch locking motorized deadbolt. With your personalized code, you can enter your home with the convenience of keyless entry and the LED illumination provides increased visibility. It features patented SecureScreen™ technology to prevent code detection from fingerprints on the touchscreen. Obsidian is easy to install, program and use, and operates on 4 AA batteries; must purchase separately.
feature_bullets: Modern Design - Sleek, low-profile design with a glass-like surface
Keyless Convenience - Enter your home with user codes instead of having to carry keys
User Codes - Up to 16 customizable user codes and master code option for increased security
SecureScreen - Patented technology to help prevent code detection from fingerprints on the touchscreen
9V Backup Power - Use a 9V battery as backup power in case the batteries run out
This version of Kwikset Obsidian does not feature wireless connectivity

specifications.Included Components: Interior Assembly, Mounting Plate, Adapter Ring, Latch, Strike, Fasteners, Exterior Touchscreen
specifications.Warranty Description: Lifetime mechanical and finish warranty, 1 year electronics warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars201 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
